description:
This hypnotherapy course will help you to re-align with and manifest any goals and dreams that you have for yourself. If you're looking for love, are an entrepreneur, want better relationships, business or just a clearer picture of your path in life - then this is the programme for you!

Included in this course is are a:

- Hypnosis induction

- Meet the best version of yourself exercise

- Finding the love you have for yourself exercise

It takes no longer than 45minutes to complete in one sitting, however you have total control and can choose to split it further into two sessions.

Your subconscious will provide all the answers, feelings and knowledge you need to move forwards in your life. This course is perfect for helping you to reconnect with the answers you already have buried within you.
title: Hypnosis: How to meet the best version of yourself
